title: Floral Birthday Hoop
description: Personalized hand-embroidered hoop art featuring a beautiful wreath of French knot roses and custom calligraphy.

title: Princess Ribbon Hoop
description: An enchanting piece showcasing a figure with a voluminous ribbon skirt, accented with a vibrant cluster of 3D ribbon roses.

title: Newborn Footprint Art
description: A heartfelt piece with embroidered baby footprints, a custom quote, and delicate floral accents—perfect for nurseries.

title: Custom Floral Bag
description: Small, natural canvas pouch hand-embroidered with a delicate bouquet and personalized with a name—ideal for favors or bridesmaids' gifts.

title: Christmas Holiday Hair Clips Set
description: Festive set of embroidered snap hair clips featuring classic holiday motifs like Santa hats, snowflakes, wreaths, and Christmas trees.

title: Monochrome Rose Shirt
description: Stylish white button-down shirt with a bold, diagonal trail of red roses and vines, offering a modern, masculine floral look.

title: Pastel Floral Kurti
description: Soft linen kurti (or tunic) in a gentle color, featuring dainty, scattered floral motifs on the sleeves, hem, and neckline.

title: Vibrant Yoke/Neckline Blouse
description: Richly embroidered garment featuring a dense, colorful floral design around the neck opening and yoke for a statement look.

title: Shin-chan Character Hoop
description: A fun, hand-stitched hoop art featuring the popular animated character Shin-chan, perfect as a playful room decor piece.
